resources.string: The Nyala(Tragelaphus angasii) is a South African Antelope, common in Malawi, Mozambique and Zimbabwe. A few years ago, I was in Malawi and spent part of a day at the Nyala Suocoma Game Park about 90 minutes outside Blantyre.I noticed that the Nyalas and Zebras seemed to hang out around each other. Nyala seemed to be a good name for an app that uses the ZXing(AKA "Zebra Crossing") Library
Nyala uses the Barcode Scanner app to help get you on a WiFi network. If the owner/manager of the WiFi network has encoded their access details in a QRCode
simply scan the code and Nyala will automatically complete the sign-in for you.
To create a QRCode that Nyala understands, format your WiFi details as a string like the ones below and convert that string into the QRCode
For more help or to submit feedback, send email to:\n espressobot\@gmail.com
